text:
O PRAISE Gód in his sánctuary:
praise him in the fírmament of his pówer. 2 Praise him in his nóble ácts:
praise him according to his éxcellent gréatness. 3 Praise him in the sóund of the trúmpet:
praise him upon the lúte and hárp. 4 Praise him in the tímbrels and dánces:
praise him upon the stríngs and pípe. 5 Praise him upon the wéll-tuned cýmbals:
praise him upón the loud cýmbals. 6 Let every thíng that hath bréath
práise the LÓRD. 7 Glory be to the Father, and tó the Són,
and to the Hóly Ghóst; 8 As it was in the beginning, † is now, and éver sháll be,
world wíthout énd. Amen.
